review: Great product, I would suggest over Chrome Cast,which I have. The picture quality is excellent, easy to install and setup. Chrome cast reuires your smartphone or tablet, to use.
author: MONIQUE JEMISON

review: Works great most of the time, but occasionally stops and buffers too often during viewing
author: Brenda Longbine

review: Works great, easy to use, love it.
author: Amanda Gibbs

review: I love everything about this product except for the fact that now I get nothing done because I'm catching up on all my tv series.
author: mmordica

review: Easy to hook up, easy to use. There are so many things to do with it. So easy to use that even my husband can use it without losing patience.
author: Tootie
